Description: Polychrome tapestry band from linen garment decorated with representations of saints on red ground; foliate borders on dark blue ground on either side; plain weave-bleached linen (S/15), weft-bleached linen (S/20); tapestry on grouped threads: warp-undyed linen (S spun Z ply/12), weft-bleached linen (S/40), yellow, orange, light and dark blue, light and dark green, mauve, purple and red wool (S/36); oversewing in bleached linen (S spun Z ply); edges of the plain weave are cut ragged, the two ends of the tapestry are cut and the sides are hemmed and turned under; the band is in two parts, sewn together with oversewing, because of this the figures are in different directions
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
